meanings.definition: A person who uses drugs regularly, especially illegally.
meanings.sent1: The druggie was caught with illegal substances in his possession.
meanings.sent2: The police arrested the druggie for drug possession.
meanings.sent3: The druggie tried to hide his stash of drugs in a hollowed-out book.
meanings.sent4: The druggie's life spiraled out of control as his addiction worsened.
meanings.sent5: The community rallied together to help the druggie seek treatment for his drug addiction.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a person who is addicted to drugs.
meanings.sent1: The druggie behavior of the man was concerning to his family.
meanings.sent2: Her druggie habits led to serious health issues.
meanings.sent3: The druggie cat kept knocking over the medicine cabinet looking for catnip.
meanings.sent4: The dark circles under her eyes were a druggie reminder of her addiction.
meanings.sent5: The druggie lifestyle took a toll on his relationships and well-being.
